name: RURAL FAITH DEVELOPMENT COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION, INC.
description: community development and poverty reduction, especially for small and/or rural areas
sampleDescriptions: Support for resources to assist impoverished individuals and communities; to help fight opioid addiction; to create affordable housing; and to end veterans homelessness.
